a.n: One Day With - Kristina Gorbunova Playmat (2020)

p.k: This new episode of One day with presents the private life of our 2020 Playmate of the year, Kristina Gorbunova, from Russia! From the morning, playing with her dog, until the evening, posing for a professional photographer. To start a brand new day, Kristina goes to the park in order to practice some and keep herself in great shape. She has a passion for tennis so she also participates in a special training. Also, she tells us about the whole journey until she was elected the Playmate 2020. Now come with us and donâ€™t miss anything from her everyday life!
